statements: DELETE FROM UserAccessLogs WHERE verification_method = 'facial' AND access_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM UserAccessLogs WHERE verification_method = 'face recognition';
DELETE FROM face_recognition_logs WHERE user_id = 10 AND verification_result = false;
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 101 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'mobile' AND last_seen < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 100 AND permission_level = 2;
